sentence.text: I was so glad when you came in and I thought I should have someone agreeable to talk to after all . "
We were as glad as anything when we saw this rain coming down .
I 'm glad that since I lost weight , they 're hardly noticeable .
I am glad of my early sexual experiences .
The other women laughed , glad of some light relief .
I was glad of these few minutes alone with Eric .
I 'm really really glad about that .
I was glad for them , but I only felt exhausted .
` One can only be glad for their sakes .
I was glad to meet Alan Savory , the opposition spokesman -- a young , cool customer , dark and striking .
I was glad he did that .
And the May month flaps its glad green leaves like wings ,
If you are interested in coming to our University we shall be very glad to find a place for you if we can , and most certainly to welcome you if you are admitted .
` I 'd be glad to hear the little mite cry more .

Jenna was glad that Claudine had not come .
Charles was glad to have his surmise confirmed .
She said , ` I 'm so terribly glad .
We 're so very glad that you came .
In your glad rags and no mistake . "
You 'll be glad of it in three weeks time when your face is back to normal .
I 'm glad I did .
